name: Brainstorm Cell Therapeutics Inc.
description: Brainstorm Cell Therapeutics Inc. is a leading biotechnology company focused on the development and commercialization of innovative therapies for neurodegenerative diseases. Founded in 2004, Brainstorm has pioneered the use of its proprietary NurOwn® platform, which utilizes a patient's own mesenchymal stem cells to create therapeutic cells capable of secreting neuroprotective factors. This unique approach aims to address unmet medical needs in conditions such as amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) and multiple sclerosis (MS). The company is dedicated to advancing its clinical research and has shown promising results in its trials, positioning itself as a key player in the field of regenerative medicine. Brainstorm is committed to enhancing the quality of life for patients suffering from debilitating neurological disorders and strives to bring innovative solutions to the market. With a strong focus on scientific excellence and patient-centric approaches, Brainstorm aims to lead the way in the development of transformative therapies that can change the landscape of neurodegenerative diseases.
